sourcesContent:
import React from "react"; import { useCart } from "../App"; import { useNavigate } from 'react-router-dom'; import { Trash2, Minus, Plus, ShoppingBag } from 'lucide-react'; const Cart = () => { const { cart, removeFromCart, updateQuantity } = useCart(); const navigate = useNavigate(); const subtotal = cart.reduce((sum, item) => sum + (item.price || 0) * (item.qty || 1), 0); const shipping = cart.length > 0 ? 50 : 0; const tax = subtotal * 0.08; const total = subtotal + shipping + tax; if (cart.length === 0) { return (

Your Cart is Empty

Add some beautiful rings to get started!

); } return (

Shopping Cart

{/* Cart Items */}
{cart.map(item => (
{item.image_url ? ( ) : ( 💍 )}

{item.design_label}

{item.metal_label} • {item.shape_label} • {item.carat}ct

{item.qty || 1}

${((item.price || 0) * (item.qty || 1)).toLocaleString()}

${(item.price || 0).toLocaleString()} each

))}
{/* Order Summary */}

Order Summary

Subtotal ({cart.length} items) ${subtotal.toLocaleString()}
Shipping ${shipping.toLocaleString()}
Tax ${tax.toLocaleString()}
Total ${total.toLocaleString()}
); }; export default Cart;
